Class PathMapObjectLoader

java.lang.Object
de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.environment.MapObjectLoader
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.utils.PathMapObjectLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.environment.IMapObjectLoader
public class PathMapObjectLoader extends de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.environment.MapObjectLoader
Loads map objects of type "PATH" and constructs an Alien that follows the path defined by the polyline in the map object. The loader converts the polyline into a Path2D, extracts all points, optionally reverses or closes the path, and sets up the alien with an AlienController.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PathMapObjectLoader()
    Creates a new loader for map objects of type "PATH".

  • Method Details

    • load

      public Collection<de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.IEntity> load(de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.environment.Environment environment, de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.environment.tilemap.IMapObject mapObject)
      Loads an alien path from the given map object. If the object is a valid "alien-path" polyline, the method creates a path, extracts its points, determines whether it should close or reverse, initializes an Alien, and attaches an AlienController to handle movement along the path.
      Parameters:
      environment - the environment into which entities are being loaded
      mapObject - the map object defining the polyline path
      Returns:
      a collection containing the created alien, or an empty collection if invalid
